specific_question: How many patients do we expect to retain through AI-driven personalization by Q3 2025?
answer: 50,000 patients retained through AI-driven personalization by Q3 2025.
justification: Provides insight into effectiveness of trendy new CRM solutions.
dr_question: How can MediConn Solutions leverage trendy new CRM solutions to improve patient engagement and retention, and what new CRM solutions are expected in 2025?
